thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Valora Holding FY EBIT Up By 9.3 Pct To CHF 79.0 Mln​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valora Holding FY EBIT Up By 9.3 Pct To CHF 79.0 Mln​
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Valora Holding AG:
* ‍FY EBIT OF CHF 79.0 MIO. (+9.3%)​ * SEES 2018 ‍EBIT OF CHF 90 MIO. (+/- CHF 3 MIO.)
* FY ‍HIGHER GROSS PROFIT MARGIN OF 42.0%​ * ‍FY GROUP PROFIT​ OF 57.1 MILLION CHF VERSUS 63.4 MILLION CHF YEAR AGO
* PROPOSED DIVIDEND OF CHF 12.50 FROM CAPITAL RESERVES FOR 2017
* AT CHF 2,075.3 MILLION, FY GROUP‘S NET REVENUES WERE SLIGHTLY LOWER THAN THE PREVIOUS YEAR (-0.9%) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
